name: Unemployed
description:
They say you don't have any 'useful skills', but at least your clothes fit
well.

name: Tailor
description:
You've made and adjusted clothing for some of the biggest names in town.
Now, their undead bodies are trying to eat your brains. At least you'll be
able to keep your own clothing repaired.

name: Nazi Soldier
description: You came to serve the Fatherland. Something has gone horribly wrong, however. This is not Nazi Germany.

name: Survivalist
description:
You are well-equipped to survive, which will undoubtedly prove invaluable. 
Now you finally get in, and the whole world goes to shit.
You start out with some military gear.

name: Lab Technician
description:
It was your first day in the lab when the cataclysm hit. You were evacuated
with all the civilians, but at least you kept your lab gear.

name: Wannabe Mechanic
description:
Although you never got your driver's license, you've always loved cars.
You start with a wrench, a toolbelt, and some car-related reading material.

name: Scoundrel
description:
Your flexible outlook on law has ensured your survival, but now what?
You start with cargo pants, a hoodie, "sundries", and one additional level of melee.

name: Lowtax
description: Founder of Something Awful...

name: Vincent Vega
description:
When the bitch O.D.ed on heroin, you thought it could wait until Mr. Wallace came back. 
 When Mrs. Wallace came back to life, then you knew it was serious..

name: Chigurh
description: Call it, Friendo.

name: Drug Lord
description: By the time the end happened, you were so coked up you didn't even notice. .

name: Elvis Presley
description:
You're the King. But the King has problems. 
 Drug problems.

name: Bad Lieutenant
description: You, your badge, and your drugs. What, you don't have a lucky crack pipe?

name: Mansonite
description:
When Charlie told you to get the job done, you went and got it done. 
 But you didn't expect the corpse to rise from the dead when you killed them, did you?.

name: American Psycho
description:
The others are all dead, but you're still alive. Who's laughing now?
You start with meat, a suit, and "a gram".

name: Buffalo Bill
description: Goodbye horses, I'm dying over you....

name: Mac
description: Which are worse? The things... or the undead?

name: OJ Simpson
description: So you killed Nicole. Bet you didn't expect her to get back up.

name: Raoul Duke
description:
We had two bags of grass, seventy five pellets of mescaline, five sheets of high powered blotter acid,
 a salt shaker half full of cocaine, a whole galaxy of uppers, downers, screamers and laughers.
 Also, a quart of tequila, a quart of rum, a case of beer, a pint of ether, and two dozen Amyls.

name: Marion Barry
description: Mayor of New York. Caught smoking crack on camera.

name: Meth Head
description:
Got any meth? Listen, man. I can tell you do. Don't you lie to me. I'll cut you. I swear to god. 
You start out with a strong amphetamine addiction, and a teenther of meth.

name: Fight Club
description: I am Jack's smirking sense of self satisfaction.

name: Chain Smoker
description:
Everyone at work knew you as the person who always had a cigarette or two
in hand. Now, you're down to a single pack, and you hope you find more soon.
You start out with a strong nicotine addiction, and 10 cigarettes.
